name: Dariusburst: Another Chronicle EX+
overview: Dariusburst: Another Chronicle EX+ is an enhanced port of the previously arcade-exclusive shooter Dariusburst: Another Chronicle EX. It features a carefully-recreated port of the original game along with new features. A new set of eight events extend the game's story, some of which feature new music by Zuntata musician Shohei Tsuchiya. Players can now play using the Murakumo craft, previously unplayable in the arcade release. A replay mode lets players watch runs by expert players. Replays can be downloaded from the top scoring player on each leaderboard. A "ghost score" mode lets player replay top players' score in realtime as the play, allowing them to compare their scoring strategy.
